players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Stay vigilant, as there is still one more Mafioso among us."
Diana: "Bob was a good guy, I don't think Charlie is the Mafioso. We should focus on finding the real killer."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
